metadata.Title: CVE-2020-27788 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - low.
metadata.Description:
An out-of-bounds read access vulnerability was discovered in UPX in PackLinuxElf64::canPack() function of p_lx_elf.cpp file. An attacker with a crafted input file could trigger this issue that could cause a crash leading to a denial of service.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-27788` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

upx-ucl - 3.96-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: upx-ucl package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.96-3').
